Even if I don't have a code, exploring this option to see what is offered or if there are any prompts for additional savings is a natural behavior for someone with her financial habits.
6. Other options like changing payment methods or pickup locations are not immediately necessary. The free promotional offers are already applied and don't require action.
7. Therefore, clicking on "Add Gift Cards, Store Credit or Discount Code" is the most logical and persona-aligned next step, given the inability to input text into the security code field.
